note.p: Birth: Conduit Street, London, England (13 March 1798)
Burial: Mid Lavant churchyard, near Chichester, Sussex
Education: Christ Church College, Oxford. BA (1821), MA (1824), BD and DD (1837)
Career: Ordained Deacon (1821); Curate, Whippingham, Isle of Wight; preached at the Chapel Royal; Vicar of Leeds (1837-1859); Dean of Chichester (1859-1875)
